ingredients.item: 800g pack essential Waitrose British Chicken Thighs, skin removed
1 essential Waitrose courgette, cut into 3cm dice

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6.

Place the chicken, vegetables and half the basil in a roasting tin. Blend the stock cube with 1 tbsp boiling water and drizzle over the chicken. Season and roast for 30 minutes until cooked throughout.
Sprinkle over remaining basil and serve with salad.
